channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- Atlantis Word Processor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- Atlantis Word Processor

item.title: CVE-2018-4040|2024-09-17T00:36:10.536Z -- talos -- atlantis%20word%20processor
item.description: An exploitable uninitialized pointer vulnerability exists in the rich text format parser of Atlantis Word Processor, version 3.2.7.2. A specially crafted document can cause certain RTF tokens to dereference a pointer that has been uninitialized and then write to it. An attacker must convince a victim to open a specially crafted document in order to trigger this vulnerability.
